title: What do you call Renekton in a chain vest?

replies.body:
Where do champions from the Freljord train?

On fields of just ice!
Sorry to tell you but lore "team" removed the fields of justice

> [{quoted}](name=Budupops,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=bOIPmpoE,comment-id=00090003,timestamp=2015-05-24T13:38:58.534+0000)
>
> Sorry to tell you but lore "team" removed the fields of justice

INTERN: Okay, so, I made that list for you guys, about what we're keeping after the Great Retcon.
NARRATIVE: Alright, let's hear it. One at a time.
INTERN: Sure. (reads) After the Great Retcon, the League of Legends universe will contain…
INTERN: Summoners?
NARRATIVE: Nope.
INTERN: (scratches off "Summoners") Wow. Pretty big change.
INTERN: What about Sona's voiceover?
NARRATIVE: She will be *DEALT WITH.*
SONA: (hides)
INTERN: Gonna be renaming those spells, then?
NARRATIVE: (stares coldly in silence)
INTERN: (awkwardly continues) Uh. Champions?
NARRATIVE: (smiling broadly) We love Champions.
SONA: (peeks in)
NARRATIVE: (still smiling, eyes empty) Those who comply.
INTERN: The Fields of Justice?
NARRATIVE: Axe 'em.
INTERN: Um, alright.
INTERN: The Institute of War?
NARRATIVE: Nope.
INTERN: Yordles?
NARRATIVE: Ehhh…
SKINS TEAM: We'd like to keep those.
NARRATIVE: Okay, fine, just put a wavy line under that one. We have *plans* for them.
INTERN: Rammus' lore?
NARRATIVE: Yes, but everything is phrased in the form of a question.
INTERN: What is this, Jeopardy?
NARRATIVE: Like that, yes.
INTERN: (pauses)
INTERN: What about Valoran?
NARRATIVE: Keep it, but we'll redraw the map.
INTERN: How?
NARRATIVE: Next item.
INTERN: The Rune Wars?
NARRATIVE: There are ancient tales of great "Rune Wars" in the distant past.
NARRATIVE: As for whether these tales are true, who can say?
INTERN: I thought you could say. I thought that's what you were for.
NARRATIVE: Put a question mark next to it and keep going.
INTERN: The Brackern?
NARRATIVE: Skarner can't miss what never was.
INTERN: Harsh.
INTERN: Okay, that's everything.
NARRATIVE: I think you're forgetting one last item.
INTERN: I went through the entire list.
NARRATIVE: Look again.
INTERN: …wait, isn't that just a header that didn't get formatted?
NARRATIVE: Nope.
INTERN: You seriously want me to ask this one?
NARRATIVE: Yes.
INTERN: (rolls eyes)
INTERN: Alright, tell me, is League of Legends lore going to keep the League of Legends?
NARRATIVE: Of course not.
INTERN: …what? Now hold on a second. You can't delete the League from League.
INTERN: That's like deleting Metroids from Metroid.
INTERN: That's like…that's like *deleting the League of Legends from League of Legends,* man!
NARRATIVE: (cold stare)
INTERN: No, no more creepy stares! This is nuts! I know I'm just an intern, but—
NARRATIVE: (inclines head to the side)
NARRATIVE: Are you, though?
~~INTERN: Yes, I am, I'm an inte~~
NARRATIVE: (picks up clipboard from in front of empty chair, walks out)
lol

I'll never forgive what riot did to trundles voice overs just to put him in the felijord.
Oh god are they terrible compared to his old ones :P

His new ones really aren't bad though. . .

Just because the changed his lore, visuals, and VO, that doesn't make any of them *"bad"*.
If you're upset about the replacement of those things, that a different topic entirely.

No, not poor quality.
I mean I don't like them as in they're just in poor taste and aren't as funny or meaningful/
Some of his taunts are alright and his jokes are ok I guess too.
But I liked his old stuff far more.


It's not bad quality, its just not as good.

Idgaf a
bout thematics/asthetics whe
He could be a hooker in his lore for all i care, Idc about lore so much as I care about solid Voice acting and voice overs and smooth sound effects and animations.

Lore has never been a major factor and never will be to me for anything outside of extra fun stuff to get interested in if I'm in the mood.

I can't remember the last time I was interested in the lore of this game.

I just don't like that we had to rework his VO for no reason other than for the sake of change.
There was nothing wrong with his old one.


He sounded lonely and funny and I liked it.

Same with skarner basically.
I like both their VO/VA's they're solid.
Phreak has a challenger!
You just have to rub it in, dont you?
they deserve to know what is going on in their own company

I was talking abou the Rioters rubbing it in. I dont find this joke funny as these guys removed fields of justice themselves for no reason, they could have done everything differently, but no, retcon everything.
why does rito personnel get all does upvotes so easy?? im sad now..

Firsty, it was a good pun.

Secondly, because  hypocrisy.
no puns are good puns, all puns are terrible
"I'll take a sense of humor for 10 euros!" -Ironhold
Ironic because that was funny

It's a little thing called ~~"Appeal to Authority"~~ "Appeal to Rito."

FIXED

That's not appeal to authority. Appeal to authority is when you use a figure with some authority in whatever field you're discussing to back up your argument, like the popular "4 out 5 dentists recommend this brand of toothpaste!" or using a well-respected physicist to back up your thesis on a physics paper.

It's easier to say brown-nosing, whether it is or is not actually the case.
GET OUT OF HERE *points to the exit door*

Actually, unless I am mistaken, renekton is a crocodile, not an alligator, since he is both a  reference to Eqyptian mythology, and there are no alligators in Egypt, and when his mouth is closed, the team hang out in a "smile". 


Still funny though.
